result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel Johnson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Daniel Johnson in court.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer in court for Daniel Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Michelle A. Grasso in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a plea and sentencing. Defense is requesting an adjournment as the parties are still negotiating.  Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 2:00 pm for plea and sentencing in person in Room 504 of the Courthouse.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Justice Point Noncompliance Report forwarded to the Judge for review and filed.

Plea and sentencing scheduled for 7-15-22 at 11:00 am is rescheduled to 9-22-22 at 2:30  pm.  Court will be down on 7-15-22 because there are no court reporters available.  Parties agreed new court date via email.

Defendant Daniel Johnson in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daniel Johnson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests plea and sentencing hearing.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Daniel Johnson in court with attorney Matthew V Plummer.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties appeared by video conference.
Attorney Plummer was recently appointed to the case and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 5-26-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Court ordered no contact with C.M.C
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Daniel Johnson in court with attorney Matt W Kline.  Defendant Daniel Johnson in custody.  Chad Wozniak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daniel Johnson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel Johnson

Prior: 2483 South 15th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53215
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
